name: bin
label: BIN
description: The Building Identification Number (BIN) from NYC Department of Buildings

name: interior_sq_ft
label: Finished space
description: Total measurable finished space, in square feet.

name: legal_room_count
label: Legal rooms
description: Number of legal rooms in the unit.

name: original_legal_room_count
label: Original legal rooms
description: Original number of legal rooms when the unit was built.

name: city_view_type
label: City View Type
description: How obstructed is the city view? (Full/Partial)

name: river_view_type
label: River View Type
description: How obstructed is the river view? (Full/Partial)

name: park_view_type
label: Park View Type
description: How obstructed is the park view? (Full/Partial)

name: has_floor_laundry
label: Building floor laundry
description: Does building floor have laundry? Yes or No

name: has_air_conditioning
label: Air Conditioning
description: Does the unit have air conditioning? Yes or No

name: has_juliette_balcony
label: Juliette Balcony
description: Does the unit have a Juliette Balcony? Yes or No

name: has_balcony_or_terrace
label: Balcony or Terrace
description: Does the unit have a Balcony or Terrace? Yes or No

name: has_washer_dryer
label: Washer Dryer
description: Does the unit have washer or dryer? Yes or No
